page.title: 19RECREATION 3 - STREETGAMES.
page.content: {SPOT}A ball is kicked against the wall moving further away from the target after each try. Scoring becomes more difficult.A miss earns a penalty - the letter S, two misses - P,three - O and four - T. After S.P.O.T. - you're out! {TALLY HO!} There are two teams - one must catch the other. If caught,you're put against the wall,but if your team- mate reaches the wall and shouts"Tally Ho!"the "captives" are free. {WOUNDED SOLDIERS} The players stand in a ring and pass a ball around. If you drop the ball ,you "lose"a leg, arm or eye and you aren't allowed to use it again until you catch the ball twice. {RAIN,THUNDER,LIGHTNING. } One person calls "Rain,thunder,lightning" and on the word "lightning", everybody does handstands. Whoever stays in the air the longest, calls next time. {C.Robson,S.Nield,J.Patterson,N.Robson.
